page.title: 12A DAY IN THE LIFE OF
page.content: THE GRAHAM FAMILY TADWICK Nr BATH SUNDAY 30th June l985 7.30 Made tea. 8.l5 All got up _Dad weeding strawberries. 9.00 Breakfast _Porridge,toast,orange juice,coffee. 9.30 Girls getting ready for Bible Class. Katie finding leaves for school sponsor form. l0.30 Girls left for Bible Class at Church. Mum prepares lunch - lamb,greens,new potatoes, broad beans,gooseberry pie & cream. Dad gardening. l2.00 Coffee, girls arrive home. l.45 Eat lunch. 3.00 Washing up completed, sold garden produce.Dad gardening. 4.00 Girls cycling,homework,hairwash. 5.00 cup of tea. Gardening. 6.30 Watched news on T.V. Hoovered bedroom. 7.00 Tea time, hoovered kitchen.7.45 gardening, ironing & mending. 9.00 Bathtime, reading. Dad gardening. 9.20 Girls bed l0.00 Mum to bed. ll.30 Dad to bed.
